featuredArticle.title: COP30 Brazil: 195 Nations Pledge to Cut Emissions 60% by 2035
featuredArticle.excerpt: In a historic agreement at COP30 in Belém, Brazil, world leaders committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions by 60% by 2035. The deal includes binding targets, financial commitments for developing nations, and new mechanisms for accountability.
